customer_name: MELODI L. CONNOR CHRISTOPHER J. CONNOR

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Regularly scheduled visits to the facility by the attending veterinarian are not occurring. The facility’s written program of
veterinary care indicates that regularly scheduled visits to the premises by the veterinarian are to occur annually, however
the attending veterinarian has not been to the facility in over two years.
Not following the instructions of the attending veterinarian and infrequent routine facility visits risks the health and well-
being of the animals. Correct by ensuring that the program of veterinary care is followed and that regular visits to the
premises by the attending veterinarian are occurring at the frequency defined in the program, but not less than annually.
Correct by April 21st, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Regularly scheduled visits to the facility by the attending veterinarian are not occurring. The facility’s written program of 
veterinary care indicates that regularly scheduled visits to the premises by the veterinarian are to occur annually, however 
the attending veterinarian has not been to the facility in over two years.   
 
Not following the instructions of the attending veterinarian and infrequent routine facility visits risks the health and well-
being of the animals. Correct by ensuring that the program of veterinary care is followed and that regular visits to the 
premises by the attending veterinarian are occurring at the frequency defined in the program, but not less than annually. 
Correct by April 21st, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
